question: What is the theme of the 21st National conference on e-Governance 2018?
explanation: The 21st edition of National conference on e-Governance has started in Hyderabad, Telangana with theme \"Technology for Accelerating Development\" on February 26, 2018. The conference, which is jointly organised by the Government of India (GoI) and Telangana Administrative Reforms department, will provide a forum for Secretaries of Administrative Reforms and Information Technology of the Centre and the State Governments, IT Managers and software solution providers to exchange views, discuss issues and analyse various solution frameworks. The two-day conference will deliberate on several aspects of the e-governance including its universalization and replication, governing e-governance, best practices, emerging technologies and synergising role of national and state governments.
